articles.title: AMD Promises Continued Driver Support For RDNA 1 “RX 5000” & RDNA 2 “RX 6000” GPUs - Wccftech
articles.description: AMD has confirmed continued driver support for its older Radeon GPUs based on the RDNA 1 & RDNA 2 architecture in a new statement.
articles.content:
AMD has confirmed continued driver support for its older Radeon GPUs based on the RDNA 1 & RDNA 2 architecture in a new statement.

articles.author: Meir Orbach
articles.title: Israeli AI startup AUI secures $20 million SAFE round at $750 million valuation cap - calcalistech.com
articles.description: The company says its hybrid symbolic–generative model can manage structured, task-based conversations where ChatGPT-style systems falter.
articles.content: Augmented Intelligence (AUI), founded in 2017 by Ohad Elhelo and Ori Cohen, has raised $20 million in a SAFE (Simple Agreement for Future Equity) round. The round sets a valuation cap of $750 million… [+1913 chars]
